Before you start, here is a brief explanation of how the game works and some important rules to keep in mind:Before you start, here is a brief explanation of how the game works and some important rules to keep in mind:
On the home page, you will find a list of categories available to play.
From science to film, choose the category that interests you most and get ready to answer challenging questions.
Once you\'ve selected a category, we\'ll present you with a series of related questions.
Read each question carefully and choose the correct answer from the options provided.
Each correct answer will earn you points!
Challenge your friends and climb the leaderboard to show who is the best!
" Last but not least, have fun!"
Quizap is designed to offer a fun and challenging experience for all trivia lovers.
You will have to answer the question that will appear at the top of the screen by clicking on one of the answers,
The time limit will be calculated below, if the bar is full it will count as a failure and the answers will be shown, in red those that are not correct and in green those that are correct.
